description:
Kawachi finds the yakisoba challenge quite easy, but Kazuma can’t get the hang of cooking. Will he be able to think of something in time before he has to face Spencer Henry Hoko, an amazing baker who is renowned for his yakisoba bread?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Invincible Team!! Win with Ono no Komachi!
La meilleure des équipes ! On gagnera avec Ono no Komachi !
Saikyou Team!! Onono Komachi-san de Katsu n ja!
สุดยอดทีมแกร่ง ! จะชนะด้วย คุณโอโนโนะ โคมาจิ นี่ล่ะ!
最強チーム!! 小野小町さんで勝つんじゃ!
